hit.name: Hit Rate
hit.description:
Increases the chance of skills hitting their 
target.

eva.name: Evasion Rate
eva.description:
Increases the likely-hood of an actor evading
a physical skill.

cev.name: Critical Evasion Rate
cev.description:
Decreases the likely-hood of skills targeting 
the actor being critical.

mev.name: Magic Evasion Rate
mev.description:
Increases the likely-hood of an actor evading 
a magical skill.

mrf.name: Magic Reflection Rate
mrf.description:
The higher the value, the more likely magical 
reflection will occur.

hrg.name: Hp Regeneration
hrg.description: The rate in which the actor gains HP each turn.

mrg.name: Mp Regeneration
mrg.description: The rate in which the actor gains MP each turn.

trg.name: Tp Regeneration
trg.description: The rate in which the actor gains TP each turn.

tgr.name: Target Rate
tgr.description: Increases the chance of the actor being attacked.

grd.name: Guard Effect Rate
grd.description: Increases the effectiveness of the actor's guard

rec.name: Recovery Effect Rate
rec.description: Determines the effectiveness of recovery skills.

pha.name: Pharmacology
pha.description: Determines the effectiveness of recovery items.

mcr.name: Mp Cost Rate
mcr.description: The rate in which MP skills cost.

tcr.name: Tp Charge Rate
tcr.description: The rate in which TP skills cost.

pdr.name: Physical Damage Rate
pdr.description: The rate in which physical damage occurs.

mdr.name: Magical Damage Rate
mdr.description: The rate in which magical damage occurs.

fdr.name: Floor Damage Rate
fdr.description: The rate in which floor damage occurs.

exr.name: Experience Rate
exr.description: The rate in which the actor gains experience.
